lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The official, the LDP Policy Affairs Research Council's Chairman Masayoshi Ito, told a press conference the proposed supplementary budget will probably be compiled no earlier than August but before November.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: These measures should be treated as an emergency, partly because of the urgent need for Japan to redress its external trade imbalance with the U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The ruling Liberal Democratic Party has drawn up the guidelines of an economic package including a supplementary budget of more than 5,000 billion yen, a senior party official said.
